summary:
Add Bandit Raids on Skyrim Forts
Vanilla Assets Only No Script
descriptionHtml:
Add Bandit Raids on Skyrim Forts
Vanilla Assets Only No Script

[color=#ffff00][size=5]Thank you for the support and donation:
[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=3]I never thought the community here on nexus are very kind people, I cant thank enough these individuals
who supported me financially so I'll just post their name in my mod pages.
[color=#ffff00][size=3][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7889849/?]mayd4me[/url][/size][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#ff7700][size=5][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/users/3089165/?]Huniken[/url][/color][/size][/color]
[color=#00ffff][size=5][color=#00ffff][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4053262/?][b]C.P.[/b][/url][/size][/color]
[b]Thierry[/b][/size][/color][color=#00ffff][size=5](mysterious donator)[/size][/color]

Story:
While Imperials and Stormcloaks are killing each other
the bandits see this opportunity to seek fortunes on the these forts.

[color=#00ff00][size=4]I recommend my
[color=#00ff00][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82711/?]Falmer Fort Raids[/url][/size][/color]
[color=#00ff00][size=4][color=#00ff00][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82391/?]Undead Fort Raids[/url][/size][/color][/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79919/?]Dragon Attack on Forts[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79763?]Forts Invasion of Phantom Bandits[/url]
[color=#00ff00][size=4][color=#00ff00][size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82460/?]Fort Wars Imperial and Stormcloak Elites[/url][/size][/color][/size][/color]
for super duper f*ckin epic war on forts.[/size][/color]

[color=#00ff00]There are three version:[/color]
1. Regular Version
2. Perked Version
3. Perked 2 Version removes the cloak spells on the bandit mages because they keep spamming it like a retard

[b][size=3]Bandits that die will respawn within 10 days
just dont visit the place within 10 days.[/size][/b]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Each fort will spawn 15 random generated vanilla bandits.
Location of Forts attacked by the Bandits:

Amol
Dunstad
Greenwall
Greymoor
Hraggstad
Kastav
Neugrad
Snowhawk  
Sungard
Fellhammer

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[color=#ff7700]Updates: add perk 2 version
              removes the cloak spells on the bandit mages because they keep spamming it like a retard.[/color]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requirements: Skyrim Latest Update, Dawnguard, Dragonborn
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation: Use NMM or manually install by drag and drop to Data Folder
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Update to latest version: Download and Overwrite if ask
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall: Use NMM or manually delete files and esp (Completely safe to uninstall anytime)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility: Compatible with all Mods because I only use Vanilla Assets
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Future Plans: Add More
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out my other Skyrim mods: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/27633780/?tb=mods&pUp=1]dlarkz skyrim mods[/url]
author: dlarkz
